Hope to see you next AUSAPE Forum 2025 !!!

entry.title: SAP Inside Track Barcelona 2024 - Nov 22, 2024
entry.content:
Hi Barcelona and SAP Community !!

We are very excited to announce to you that SAP Inside Track Barcelona 8th edition will take place next November 22nd 2024.

A SAP Inside Track (SIT) is a local grassroots community organised event where SAP Community Network members come together to share knowledge and expertise and to network about SAP related topics. SAP Inside Tracks have been very successful in countries all over the World.

Come to learn and share your knowledge with your peers as well as make new friends in an informal atmosphere.

SAP Inside Track events offer SAP Community provided sessions from SAP Experts and passionate SAP Community members.

We invite you to participate and help us to do a great event.  Don‚Äôt forget to invite your colleagues.

Where 

Modernist Room (Carrer de Roger de Flor 48, 08018 Barcelona) ‚û°Ô∏è https://goo.gl/maps/Kp25w8mZgLo

Who

For local and global SAP community (customers, consultants, freelancers, startups, press and bloggers, SAP employees) plus for those totally new to SAP. The most important is that you want to share and gain some knowledge and new buddies.

Registration

WIP. Stay tuned for updates.

Sessions and Agenda 

This year 2024, agenda (*) will have next schema

  • Opening SITBarcelona
  • SITBarcelona sessions (Block 1)
  • Break/beverages & snacks
  • Mini Code JAM: TBC
  • Lunch
  • SITBarcelona sessions (Block 2)
  • Closing SITBarcelona

* A detailed agenda will be published around October.

(NEW) Call for speakers and content is OPEN ‚û°Ô∏è LINK to summit sessions

(NEW) You will find SITBarcelona event here :

https://community.sap.com/t5/sap-inside-track/sap-inside-track-barcelona-nov-22th-2024/ev-p/13756577

 

Twitter ‚û°Ô∏è Official twitter account will be : @sitbarcelona

Hashtags for SAP Inside Track Barcelona are  #SITBarcelona and #SITBCN

 

About complete agenda, sponsorship packages, accomodation and travel info, social event,etc.. please contact us or take a look at SIT Barcelona site https://sitbarcelona.com

 

Hope to meet all of you there!

David Ruiz Badia, Lluis Salvador Suarez  , Enric Castella Imma Salmeron, Mireia Bub√≠ & Losel Tenzin

entry.title: SAP Inside Track Barcelona 2024 Recap
entry.content:
We would like to start our recap with a sincere gratituted to all who contributed making it happen, our attendees, speakers, sponsors and volunteers. This year 2024 with 80+ attendees that made SITBarcelona gathering incredible.

On Thursday evening, staff, friends and speakers of SITBarcelona enjoyed an alltogether informal dinner in a relaxed and friendly atmosphere before the event.

     

This eighth edition of SAP Inside Track Barcelona featured a diverse and engaging program. It included presentations by SAP experts and members of the SAP Community Network, touching on a variety of cutting-edge topics.

Antonio AncosSAP 2024 de la A a la Z
Antonio LeiteKnowledge Graphs with SAP Data
Josetxu FernandezGenAI in SAP Data and Analytics
Fran Villegas

Get Business insights from your SAP data with Natural Language and Develop Gen AI solutions integrating AWS and SAP BTP Services

Alejandro RodriguezSAP BTP Chef: first SAP demo where all the pillars of BTP are shown in a practical business case.
Felipe BorgesGlobal eCompliance with SAP Document and Reporting Compliance
Gregory DoukasTechnician Training Tool powered by Apple Vision Pro and SAP S/4HANA
Maria Codinach and Harsh KumarFrit Ravich's success case in the modernization of sales application: from SMP to in-house middleware
Niranjan GattupalliImplementing gCTS for Continous Delivery in complex S/4HANA landscapes: Branching Models, Hotfix strategies and 5-Tier Architecture
Antonio ValladaresIntegration Suite addon build in SAP CAP by Code10
Bernhard LueckeReinventing Support with AI

Between the sessions at the breaks, were made several raffle to win 2 e-books and 1month free subscription to all attendees thanks to Espresso Tutorials, 2 e-books thanks to SAP PRESS and 5 100‚Ç¨ Gift Cards from SAP Store thanks to CUVIV. Here we would like to thank so much our beloved SAP Champions and friend Nil Peksen who accepted to be on stage and run some of the draws.

In addition to the insightful presentations, the event also featured a hands-on session led by Antonio Maradiaga, a member of the SAP Developer Advocates. This practical session focused on SAP Build Code and demonstrated how to develop applications using Generative AI and SAP's Joule Assistant.

As every past event, remember that all content was recorded and now availabe here. And also all official photos will be published in this album for you.

We would like to specially thank you to SAP people from Spain like  Luis Felipe Lanz, Bernhard Luecke, Jorge Perez, Cesar Martin, Antonio Maradiaga, Rafael Valdes and Carles Viaplana for their continous engament with our local SAP Community and supporting the event to take it to the next level.

As said before, big thanks to all our sponsors who year after year believe and support our SAP Community event:

The event concluded with a great sense of excitement, leaving everyone eagerly anticipating next year‚Äôs edition. A heartfelt thanks to all attendees, speakers, sponsors, and volunteers who made it all possible.

SAP Inside Track Barcelona continues to prove itself as one of the most influential events in the SAP community, offering a platform for knowledge sharing, networking, and exploring the latest innovations in the SAP ecosystem.

So, looking forward to meet all of you in SAP Inside Track Barcelona 2025!!

Mireia Bubi, Lluis Salvador, Enric Castella, Losel Tenzin, Imma Salmeron, David Ruiz

entry.title: Recap SAP Inside Track Barcelona 2025
entry.content:
SAP Inside Track Barcelona 2025: A Celebration of Community, Innovation, and Shared Knowledge.
What a journey it's been! Last November 14th, we wrapped up the 9th edition of SAP Inside Track Barcelona, and I'm still buzzing from the energy, connections, and incredible moments we shared together.

More Than Just an Event

There's something truly special about SAP Inside Track. Yes, it's about SAP technologies, innovation, and learning ‚Äî but at its core, it's about people. It's about creating a space where developers, consultants, architects, and SAP enthusiasts can come together, share their experiences, and build genuine connections that go beyond the professional realm.
This year, we brought together +100 passionate individuals in a historic Modernist building in the heart of Barcelona. From the moment the doors opened until the last photo was taken the spirit of community was palpable.


Knowledge That Inspires

The quality of sessions this year was outstanding. Our speakers delivered thought-provoking presentations covering the full spectrum of SAP technologies:

  • AI and Innovation: From Vision AI applications in quality management to conversational AI solutions that let you "talk" to your data
  • SAP BTP: Deep dives into the Business Technology Platform and its transformative capabilities of SAP Hana with Vector Engine and Knowledge Graph
  • Next-Generation Talent: Insights into how SAP University Alliances is empowering the future of our ecosystem
  • SAP BTP Real-World Solutions: Practical implementations of SAP Integration Suite, CAP, FIORI, Printing solution, Identity Services, sand more
  • Freelance market barometer 2025

A special highlight was the Spanish final of the AUSIA Hackathon -  AUSAPE final,  where we witnessed incredible creativity and problem-solving. Congratulations to SDG Group for their winning solution combining AI, data modeling, and planning on SAP BTP, and to Brait Partners for their innovative electronic invoicing automation platform. Both teams proved that new technologies have real, tangible applications in today's business landscape.

The Power of Community: A New Milestone

Speaking of community strength, I'm thrilled to share some exciting news that perfectly exemplifies what we've built together: three new extraordinary members from our community have just joined the SAP Champions program! This recognition is a testament to the collaborative spirit, knowledge sharing, and genuine passion that defines our Barcelona and Spain SAP ecosystem. It's proof that when we come together, support each other, and actively contribute to the community, incredible things happen. These achievements don't belong to individuals alone ‚Äî they're a reflection of the nurturing environment we've created through events like SIT Barcelona. Congratulations to our new Champions; you make us all proud! üèÜ @AAncos @DanielMateo @Lluis 


Gratitude to Those Who Made It Possible

None of this would have been possible without our amazing volunteering speakers who shared their expertise, experiences, and passion. Your willingness to prepare, present, and engage with attendees is what makes SIT Barcelona such a valuable learning experience. Thank you for your time, your knowledge, and your commitment to our community.
To our sponsors ‚Äî thank you for believing in the power of community events. Your support enables us to create these spaces where innovation flourishes and connections are made. You're not just supporting an event; you're investing in the growth and development of the SAP ecosystem in Spain.

And I must give a huge, heartfelt thank you to the entire SIT Barcelona organizing team, Llu√≠s, Mireia, Enric, Losel, Imma and Saul. Your dedication, countless hours of planning, problem-solving on the fly, and unwavering passion made this 9th edition possible. You are the backbone of this community, and working alongside each of you has been an absolute privilegeüíô

The Heart of It All: Community

What sets SAP Inside Track apart from other tech events is the genuine sense of community we've built together over these nine years. It's in the coffee conversations, the spontaneous debates about architecture patterns, the exchange of LinkedIn profiles, and yes, even in the collective patience when life happens (like dog medication time!).
I've seen friendships form, collaborations spark, and careers transform through the connections made at SIT Barcelona. Whether you're a first-time attendee or a veteran of all nine editions, everyone is welcomed with open arms into this wonderful ecosystem we've created together.

Looking Ahead

As we celebrate the success of our 9th edition, we're already excited about what's to come. The 10th anniversary of SIT Barcelona is on the horizon, and we have a feeling it's going to be something truly special.
To everyone who attended, spoke, sponsored, organized, or simply spread the word ‚Äî thank you. You are the reason SAP Inside Track Barcelona exists and thrives. You are the community.
Until next year, keep innovating, keep sharing, and keep being awesome! üöÄ

P.S. ‚Äî If you missed this edition or want to be part of this amazing community, stay tuned for announcements about SIT Barcelona 2026. Trust me, you don't want to miss the 10th anniversary!
#SITBarcelona #SAPInsideTrack #SAPCommunity #SAP #SAPBTP #SAPDevelopers #CommunityEvents #BarcelonaTech #TechCommunity
